attributes.action: Adopt Mr.G.N.Churchill to "Chief Advisor to the P.M".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is my opinion that,the P.M.aquires the services of "None Political Advisor" to maintain Integrity-Honor-Loyalty to re-invent a New "GREAT BRITAIN" in the sole interest of a nutured British Public.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
